metadata.title: CVE-2018-15474 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** CSV Injection (aka Excel Macro Injection or FormulaInjection) in /lib/plugins/usermanager/admin.php in DokuWiki 2018-04-22aand earlier allows remote attackers to exfiltrate sensitive data and toexecute arbitrary code via a value that is mishandled in a CSV export.NOTE: the vendor has stated "this is not a security problem in DokuWiki."

criterions.comment: dokuwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
